author: tommaso
msg: [UIMA-1462] - SimpleUimaAsService has checked in SimpleServer libraries as binaries

author: tvolkert
msg: Fixed bugs in TerraTableViewSkin and TerraListViewSkin - the logic that cleared the highlighted index and repainted immediately upon mouse wheel was broken - we were clearing the highlighted index *after* we repainted, defeating the purpose of the immediate repaint.

author: djencks
msg: With several tries, all the plugin bundles will start as bundles, but not as plugins

author: goffinet
msg: Added the ability to set maxthreshold to zero in nodeprobe, and added a special case to CF.doCompaction to not run compaction when its disabled. patch by goffinet; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-465
